naslov: Prodaja - Kuća prizemnica 87m2 s garažom + okućnica 170m2 - Vukomerec (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Prodaja - Kuća prizemnica s garažom 87 m2 + okućnica 170 m2 - Vukomerec Prodajemo kuću prizemnicu s garažom površine 87 m2 s okućnicom popvršine 170 m2. Kuća je izgrađena 1964. godine te je za adaptaciju ili rušenje. Sastoji se od: hodnika, dnevnog boravka s kuhinjom, dvije spavaće sobe i kupaonice. Kući pripada podrum te spremište u prizemlju, a iznad prizemlja nalazi se prostrana terasa s manjim spremištem. Kuća ima struju, vodu i kanalizaciju, a grijanje je trenutno preko peći na drva. Plin se nalazi na cesti. Kuća se nalazi na odličnoj poziciji, na uglu dviju ulica. Ispred kuće nalazi se vrt s voćnjakom. Orijentirana je na zapadnu stranu. Odlična prilika za investitore. Mogućnost izgradnje manje stambene zgrade s tri kata - prizemlje, kat i  uvučeni kat. Kuća se nalazi u mirnoj ulici, neposredna blizina trgovine, crkve, osnovne škole, dječjeg vrtića. For Sale - Single-Storey House with Garage 87 m² + Yard 170 m² - Vukomerec We are selling a single-storey house with a garage of 87 m² and a yard of 170 m². The house was built in 1964 and is for renovation or demolition. It consists of: hallway, living room with kitchen, two bedrooms, and a bathroom. The house has a basement and a storage room on the ground floor, and above the ground floor, there is a spacious terrace with a smaller storage room. The house has electricity, water, and sewage, and heating is currently via a wood stove. Gas is available on the street. The house is located in an excellent position, at the corner of two streets. In front of the house, there is a garden with an orchard. It is oriented to the west. An excellent opportunity for investors. There is a possibility to build a small residential building with three floors - ground floor, first floor, and a recessed top floor. The house is located in a quiet street, with immediate proximity to a store, church, elementary school, and kindergarten. Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb
